p: As of the late 2000s, plenty of studies had been carried out on the chemical composition of firs ( Abies genus), leading to the identification of several secondary metabolites such as terpenoids, flavonoids, phenols, lignans, steroids, totalling 277 compounds from 19 plants (out of about 50 known worldwide) of Abies species, among which Abies alba Mill. Further information about the chemical composition of silver firs, and the related variability, is available in Appendix A.
